                      • ch.nolix.element.GUI.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, IFluentObject<Button>, Namable<Button>, Named, OptionalNamable<Button>, OptionalTokenable<Button>, Resettable, Tokenable<Button>, Tokened, Typed, TypeRequestable, Configurable, Specifiable, Specified

    public final class Button
extends TextLineWidget<Button>
    A button is a text line widget that is supposed to be used for left mouse button presses.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
